reviewText: I loved this film!  Wonderful- inspirational and informative, both on surf culture and history as well as specifically women in surfing.  The follow-up film was just released - "The Women and the Waves 2" - I found it on surfnetwork.com.
Great documentary about women surfers.  Surfing is also a great sport for women and not just men.

Great movie for people interested in viewing women who like to surf.  I like that it showed women surfing and enjoying themselves.  It had women of all ages in it.  It focused on women who liked to surf not necessarily women who like to wear bikinis.
These amazing women echo my thoughts and feelings about surfing. The footage was good, commentary relevant and it was nicely edited. It was worth the price of the rental fee.
Enjoyed watching and learning about the history of women's surfing...if you surf you will love this video and appreciate how far the sport for women has come.
